english_translation: How many lives, joining in the mind's brush,
Become the color for the lips of Mona Lisa.

english_transliteration: Ā adhara kempu ondu miñcuvudu kaleyāgi ;
english_translation: That redness of the lip shines as an art;

kannada_original: ಮಣಿಯೊ ನೀ ಆ ಕಲೆಗೆ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Maṇiyō nī ā kalege – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Do you submit to that art? – Muddu Rāma.
